title: In all eras and centuries, a Russian warrior beats a Prussian (Soviet poster, 1943)
Text: At the Neva – beaten,In front of Ivan the Terrible – beaten,In front of Suvorov – beaten,In front of Brusilov – beaten,They were beaten in the Ukrainian War for Independence,Kill the German reptiles now.
Artist: Aleksei Ivanovich Mashistov and Vladimir Alekseevich Milashevskii.
Additional Information: Shows Russian and Prussian soldiers battling it out through the centuries.
